scripts.build: cd client && yarn build && cp -r client/build server/
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/build client/dist client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules server/build
scripts.install-all: yarn install && cd client && yarn install && cd ../server && yarn install
scripts.rebuild: yarn clean && yarn install-all && yarn build
scripts.prod: yarn rebuild && cd server && yarn serve-prod
